verses.verse: ([A Psalm] of David.) Contend, <S%H7378><s%> O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> with those who contend <S%H3401><s%> with me; Fight <S%H3898><s%> against <S%H854><s%> those who fight <S%H3898><s%> against me.
Take <S%H2388><s%> hold <S%H2388><s%> of buckler <S%H4043><s%> and shield, <S%H6793><s%> And rise <S%H6965><s%> up for my help. <S%H5833><s%>

Draw <S%H9553><s%> also the spear <S%H2595><s%> and the battle-axe to meet <S%H7122><s%> those who pursue <S%H7291><s%> me; Say <S%H559><s%> to my soul, <S%H5315><s%> "I am your salvation. <S%H3444><s%>"

Let those be ashamed <S%H954><s%> and dishonored <S%H3637><s%> who seek <S%H1245><s%> my life; <S%H5315><s%> Let those be turned <S%H5472><s%> back <S%H268><s%> and humiliated <S%H3637><s%> who devise <S%H2803><s%> evil <S%H9567><s%> against me.
Let them be like chaff <S%H4671><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the wind, <S%H7307><s%> With the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> driving <S%H1760><s%> [them] on.
Let their way <S%H1870><s%> be dark <S%H2822><s%> and slippery, <S%H2519><s%> With the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> pursuing <S%H7291><s%> them.

For without <S%H2600><s%> cause <S%H2600><s%> they hid <S%H2934><s%> their net <S%H7568><s%> for me; Without <S%H2600><s%> cause <S%H2600><s%> they dug <S%H2658><s%> a pit <S%H7845><s%> for my soul. <S%H5315><s%>

Let destruction <S%H9585><s%> come <S%H935><s%> upon him unawares <S%H3808><s%>; <S%H3045><s%> And let the net <S%H7568><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he hid <S%H2934><s%> catch <S%H3920><s%> himself; Into that very destruction <S%H9585><s%> let him fall. <S%H5307><s%>
And my soul <S%H5315><s%> shall rejoice <S%H1523><s%> in the Lord; <S%H3068><s%> It shall exult <S%H7797><s%> in His salvation. <S%H3444><s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> my bones <S%H6106><s%> will say, <S%H559><s%> "Lord, <S%H3068><s%> who <S%H4310><s%> is like <S%H3644><s%> Thee, Who delivers <S%H5337><s%> the afflicted <S%H6041><s%> from him who <S%H2389><s%> is too <S%H4480><s%> strong <S%H2389><s%> for him, And the afflicted <S%H6041><s%> and the needy <S%H34><s%> from him who robs <S%H1497><s%> him?"
Malicious <S%H2555><s%> witnesses <S%H5707><s%> rise <S%H6965><s%> up; They ask <S%H7592><s%> me of things that I do not know. <S%H3045><s%>
They repay <S%H9608><s%> me evil <S%H9567><s%> for good, <S%H9186><s%> [To] the bereavement <S%H7908><s%> of my soul. <S%H5315><s%>

But as for me, when they were sick, <S%H2470><s%> my clothing <S%H3830><s%> was sackcloth; <S%H8242><s%> I humbled <S%H6031><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%> with fasting; <S%H6685><s%> And my prayer <S%H8605><s%> kept returning <S%H7725><s%> to my bosom. <S%H2436><s%>

I went <S%H1980><s%> about as though it were my friend <S%H7453><s%> or brother; <S%H251><s%> I bowed <S%H7817><s%> down <S%H7817><s%> mourning, <S%H6937><s%> as one <S%H57><s%> who <S%H57><s%> sorrows <S%H57><s%> for a mother. <S%H517><s%>

But at my stumbling <S%H6761><s%> they rejoiced, <S%H8055><s%> and gathered <S%H622><s%> themselves together; The smiters <S%H5222><s%> whom I did not know <S%H3045><s%> gathered <S%H622><s%> together against <S%H5921><s%> me, They slandered <S%H7167><s%> me without <S%H3808><s%> ceasing. <S%H1826><s%>
Like godless <S%H2611><s%> jesters <S%H3934><s%> at a feast, <S%H4580><s%> They gnashed <S%H2786><s%> at me with their teeth. <S%H8127><s%>

Lord, <S%H136><s%> how <S%H4100><s%> long <S%H4100><s%> wilt Thou look <S%H7200><s%> on? Rescue <S%H7725><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%> from their ravages, <S%H7722><s%> My only <S%H3173><s%> [life] from the lions. <S%H3715><s%>
I will give <S%H3034><s%> Thee thanks <S%H3034><s%> in the great <S%H7227><s%> congregation; <S%H6951><s%> I will praise <S%H1984><s%> Thee among a mighty <S%H6099><s%> throng. <S%H5971><s%>

Do not let those who are wrongfully <S%H8267><s%> my enemies <S%H340><s%> rejoice <S%H8055><s%> over me; Neither let those who hate <S%H8130><s%> me without <S%H2600><s%> cause <S%H2600><s%> wink <S%H7169><s%> maliciously. <S%H7169><s%> <S%H5869><s%>

For they do not speak <S%H1696><s%> peace, <S%H7965><s%> But they devise <S%H2803><s%> deceitful <S%H4820><s%> words <S%H1697><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> those who <S%H7282><s%> are quiet <S%H7282><s%> in the land. <S%H776><s%>

And they opened <S%H7337><s%> their mouth <S%H6310><s%> wide <S%H7337><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> me; They said, <S%H559><s%> "Aha, <S%H1889><s%> aha, <S%H1889><s%> our eyes <S%H5869><s%> have seen <S%H7200><s%> it!"
Thou hast seen <S%H7200><s%> it, O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> do not keep <S%H2790><s%> silent; <S%H2790><s%> O Lord, <S%H136><s%> do not be far <S%H7368><s%> from me.
Stir <S%H5782><s%> up Thyself, and awake <S%H9516><s%> to my right, <S%H4941><s%> And to my cause, <S%H7379><s%> my God <S%H430><s%> and my Lord. <S%H136><s%>
Judge <S%H8199><s%> me, O Lord <S%H3068><s%> my God, <S%H430><s%> according to Thy righteousness; <S%H6664><s%> And do not let them rejoice <S%H8055><s%> over me.
Do not let them say <S%H559><s%> in their heart, <S%H3820><s%> "Aha, <S%H1889><s%> our desire! <S%H5315><s%>" Do not let them say, <S%H559><s%> "We have swallowed <S%H1104><s%> him up!"

Let those be ashamed <S%H954><s%> and humiliated <S%H2659><s%> altogether <S%H9191><s%> who rejoice <S%H8056><s%> at my distress; <S%H9567><s%> Let those be clothed <S%H3847><s%> with shame <S%H1322><s%> and dishonor <S%H3639><s%> who magnify <S%H1431><s%> themselves over <S%H5921><s%> me.

Let them shout <S%H7442><s%> for joy <S%H7442><s%> and rejoice, <S%H8055><s%> who <S%H2655><s%> favor <S%H2655><s%> my vindication; <S%H6664><s%> And let them say <S%H559><s%> continually, <S%H8548><s%> "The Lord <S%H3068><s%> be magnified, <S%H1431><s%> Who <S%H2655><s%> delights <S%H2655><s%> in the prosperity <S%H7965><s%> of His servant. <S%H5650><s%>"
And my tongue <S%H3956><s%> shall declare <S%H1897><s%> Thy righteousness <S%H6664><s%> [And] Thy praise <S%H8416><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> long.
